Chop and Brody were about to report, well, nothing, when the air over
the g=
eyserous area seemed to cool. 

Chop (whispering): Brody, don't act surpris=
ed, but I think we got that
bastard. Let's do a subtle pass.

Brody (whispe=
ring back): Right! I'm switching to thermal scan.

The hot air fuming upwar=
ds effectively broke under a cooler cushion
that didn't move. Chop rose in =
the air, targeting the anomally and
armed a magazine of tracking bullets. A=
s he flew over it, he fired the
whole magazine.
